calculations.name: Pre Month Value - Last Year
calculations.tableau_expression:
{ sum(if [Order Date] >= [First Date Pre Month - Last Year]
        and [Order Date] < dateadd('year',-1,DATETRUNC('month',[Max Date]))
        then     [Measure Selector] end) 
}

calculation_context.Expression:
{ sum(if [Order Date] >= [First Date Pre Month - Last Year]
        and [Order Date] < dateadd('year',-1,DATETRUNC('month',[Max Date]))
        then     [Measure Selector] end) 
}

calculated_fields.Measure Selector:
case [Parameters].[Measure Selector Param]
    when 'Profit' then [Profit]
    when 'Sales' then [Sales]
END
